data.message: Hey I decided to comment on an old picture so you can get a chance to reply  and I just wanna say that I'm a huge fan of yours I wish I could one day meet you /: I'm an uprising rapper my self I call my self MC-Seven-E. Ryder, I have borrowed one of your instrumentals which is for sing for the moment and wrote my own song  and named it think for a second maybe one day we can meet and write and record some songs togesther I live In Amarillo Texas and well yeah and then you'll be my mentor It would really make me happy id be very thankful
